user_input: Modify the DHEM model. o	Get the datafile attribute for the Gas Pipeline Capacity data file for the PCIPMI infrastructure level (use crud pipeline) o	Create a variation of the Gas Pipeline Capacity data file for the PCIPMI infrastructure level by setting all values that aren't 0 to 999. Copy the H2\Gas. o	Create a new datafile object in the Datafile class using the Gas Pipeline category call it something relating to PCIPMI capacities Unlimited. Add the filename property with the name of the datafile just created. o	Add a scenario called unlimited_pci_pmi_pipeline_capacities o	Add a max flow property to each object in the H2 interconnection and H2 Internal bottleneck categories in the gas pipeline class, with the datafile and scenario created in the previous step (use crud pipeline) o	Clone the model "DHEM_v41_2030_PCIPMI_1995" and add the new scenario. Call the model "DHEM_v41_2030_PCIPMI_1995_unlmtd_pipeline"
author: Dante
default_llm_context: Perform the specified operation based on the user's input and the PLEXOS model specifications.

tasks.description: Retrieve the datafile attribute for the Gas Pipeline Capacity data file at the PCIPMI infrastructure level.
tasks.entity_selection_context: Based on the user's request, select the appropriate datafile attribute from the Gas Pipeline Capacity files.

tasks.description: Create a variation of the Gas Pipeline Capacity data file for the PCIPMI infrastructure level by copying the H2\Gas file and setting all non-zero values to 999.
tasks.entity_selection_context: Based on the user's request, identify the correct file path and target file for modification.

tasks.description: Create a new datafile object in the Datafile class for the Gas Pipeline category, named with reference to PCIPMI capacities Unlimited.
tasks.entity_selection_context: Based on the user's request, select the appropriate category and instantiate a new Datafile object.

tasks.description: Add the filename property (with the new datafile's name) to the newly created datafile object.
tasks.entity_selection_context: Based on the user's request, update the properties of the Datafile object with the filename information.
Based on the user's request, create a new scenario and associate it accordingly.

tasks.description: Update each object in the H2 interconnection category of the gas pipeline class to add a max flow property with the new datafile and scenario.
tasks.entity_selection_context: Based on the user's request, select objects within the H2 interconnection category and update their max flow property.

tasks.description: Update each object in the H2 Internal bottleneck category of the gas pipeline class to add a max flow property with the new datafile and scenario.
tasks.entity_selection_context: Based on the user's request, select objects within the H2 Internal bottleneck category and update their max flow property.

tasks.description: Clone the model 'DHEM_v41_2030_PCIPMI_1995', add the new scenario, and rename the cloned model to 'DHEM_v41_2030_PCIPMI_1995_unlmtd_pipeline'.
tasks.entity_selection_context: Based on the user's request, identify the model to clone and apply the new scenario with the updated name.
